name: Design In Mind
tagline: San Jose Branding, Web & Marketing Design Agency
description:
Design In Mind is a full-service creative agency located in heart of Silicon Valley. We deliver unique concepts, thoughtful design, and tangible results for both online and offline implementation.
We work with businesses big and small, from Fortune 500 corporations to local nonprofits.Skill sets cover branding, print design, digital marketing, web design, presentations, event creative, project management, front-end and back-end web development, social media and messaging.
